title: Is it possible to add a Command to Run ... Which brings Up Ubonto GUI interface just Like GUI command available in MATLAB.
body: Is it possible to add a Command to Run ... Which brings Up Ubuntu GUI interface  just Like  GUI command available in MATLAB

comments.body: GUI isn't officially available. Upvote the number one Uservoice if you want a GUI. It can be implemented via OpenCL/CUDA or if the Windows Driver Kit is updated for all hardware, it'll work as you ask (by doing startxfce4, unity, etc.)
